org.apache.commons.io.FileDeleteStrategy

Packages that use FileDeleteStrategy
org.apache.commons.io This package defines utility classes for working with streams, readers, writers and files. 
 

Uses of FileDeleteStrategy in org.apache.commons.io
 

Subclasses of FileDeleteStrategy in org.apache.commons.io
(package private) static class FileDeleteStrategy.ForceFileDeleteStrategy
          Force file deletion strategy.
 

Fields in org.apache.commons.io declared as FileDeleteStrategy
static FileDeleteStrategy FileDeleteStrategy.NORMAL
          The singleton instance for normal file deletion, which does not permit the deletion of directories that are not empty.
static FileDeleteStrategy FileDeleteStrategy.FORCE
          The singleton instance for forced file deletion, which always deletes, even if the file represents a non-empty directory.
private  FileDeleteStrategy FileCleaner.Tracker.deleteStrategy
          The strategy for deleting files.

          Track the specified file, using the provided marker, deleting the file when the marker instance is garbage collected.
